original_text:
Mechanical Clover
La frutta è forse l’elemento più iconico del mondo delle slot, dai tempi delle macchinette da bar, non per nulla tutti i provider, da quelli più piccoli alle realtà internazionali, si sono cimentati con questo tema, regalando molto spesso slot davvero spettacolari.
La declinazione che ne fa la BGaming non è affatto male: unire un tema storico con quello dello Steampunk ci sembra una mossa davvero azzeccata.
Per chi non lo sapesse, con il termine Steampunk ci si riferisce a quella corrente letteraria che ambienta le sue storie nell’età vittoriana, quando il progresso tecnologico si basava tutto sul vapore e sugli ingranaggi sempre più precisi in grado di far muovere qualsiasi cosa.
La grafica richiama appieno questa corrente, i frutti sembrano fatti di lamiera pur mantenendo colori brillanti e si muovono all’interno di una griglia posata in una soffitta. Introno ci sono tubi e lampadine e ai lati due campane: in una sono segnalate le linee di pagamento attive, nell’altra il moltiplicatore applicato al momento dello Spin.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di gioco ha 3 rulli e 3 righe con 5 linee di pagamento attive che diventano 27 ne dico bonus.
La puntata minima è di 0,10 € variabile sino a un massimo di 50 €.
Si può decidere di impostare la modalità automatica, con un minimo di 10 giri sino a 1.000 o all’infinito, in tal caso basterà cliccare di nuovo sullo stesso pulsante per interromperli. Volendo, ci sono diversi limiti soglia superati i quali i giri automatici si fermeranno.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è del 96,8%.
Simboli e funzionalità
I simboli sono quasi tutti quelli tradizionali delle slot classiche. Troviamo infatti ciliegie, prugne, arance, limoni, angurie campanelle e i doppi 7, più un copricapo a forma di  cilindro.
Per capirne il valore basterà entrare all’interno della tabella dei pagamenti. Come detto all’inizio, si gioca con 5 linee attive nel gioco regolare. Il quadrifoglio è il simbolo Wild. Esso atterra solo nel rullo di mezzo e come suo soluto, completa le combinazioni vincenti. Ma ha anche un’altra funzione, ossia quella di regalare da 1 a 6 free spins. Quando parte il gioco bonus, le linee di pagamento aumentano sino a 27 e inoltre viene assegnato un moltiplicatore progressivo da x2 a x7 a ogni Respin. Linee di pagamento aggiuntive e moltiplicatore vengono mostrati nelle campane accanto ai rulli.
Oltre a questa funzioni, c’è anche quella Gamble, che ci dà la possibilità di incrementare l’ultima vincita o di perdere l’intera somma. Ecco come funziona la funzione rischio: dopo una combinazione vincente, sotto la griglia compariranno due simboli, quella del dollaro per incassare la vincita, la carta da gioco per rischiare. Se decidiamo per la seconda opzione, compariranno 5 carte da gioco, una in alto, quattro in basso. Il banco girerà la sua carta e noi dovremmo sceglierne una delle quattro sperando che sia più alta della prima.

raw_translation.response:
Mechanical Clover

Fruits are possibly the most iconic element of the world of slots, dating back to the times of old-fashioned bar machines. This is why all providers, big or small, have tackled this theme at some point, often creating truly spectacular slots.

BGaming's take on this theme is quite impressive: combining historical elements with the steampunk genre seems like a brilliant move.

For those who don't know, steampunk refers to a literary movement that sets its stories in the Victorian era, when technological progress relied solely on steam and increasingly precise gears capable of moving anything.

The graphics fully reflect this movement: the fruits seem to be made of metallic material yet still maintain their bright colors, and they move within a grid set in an attic. Surrounding them are pipes and bulbs, with two bells on the sides: one indicates the active paylines, while the other shows the multiplier applied at the moment of the spin.

Slot Features

The game grid has 3 reels and 3 rows with 5 active paylines, which increase to 27 during the bonus round.

The minimum bet is €0.10 and can be increased up to a maximum of €50. You can choose the autoplay mode, from as little as 10 spins up to 1,000 or infinite, and simply click the same button again to stop. There are also several threshold limits that, once reached, will stop the automatic spins.

The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.8%.

Symbols and Functions

The symbols are almost all traditional ones seen in classic slots, such as cherries, plums, oranges, lemons, watermelons, bells, and double 7s, plus a cylinder-shaped hat.

To understand their value, simply refer to the paytable. As mentioned earlier, the game is played with 5 active lines in regular play. The four-leaf clover is the Wild symbol, landing only on the middle reel and completing winning combinations. It also has another function, which is to award between 1 and 6 free spins. During the bonus round, paylines increase to 27, and a progressive multiplier from x2 to x7 is also assigned to each Respin. Additional paylines and multipliers are shown in the bells next to the reels.

In addition to these features, there's also a Gamble function, which allows you to increase the last win or lose the entire amount. Here’s how it works: after a winning combination, two symbols will appear under the grid: a dollar symbol to collect the win and a card symbol to risk it. If you choose the latter, you'll see five playing cards: one on top and four below. The banker will reveal their card, and you'll have to choose one of the four hoping it's higher than theirs.

Overall, Mechanical Clover is an exquisitely designed slot that offers an enjoyable gaming experience, with plenty of features to keep things interesting for experienced gamblers.

raw_translation.response:
Mechanical Clover

Fruit is possibly the most iconic element of the slot world, dating back to the days of bar machines. All providers, from the smallest to the international ones, have tried their hand at this theme, often creating truly spectacular slots.

BGaming's take on this is not bad: combining a historical theme with that of Steampunk seems like a really savvy move.

For those who don't know, the term Steampunk refers to that literary current that sets its stories in the Victorian age, when technological progress was all about steam and ever more precise gears capable of moving anything.

The graphics fully recall this trend, the fruit looks like it's made of sheet metal while still maintaining bright colors and moves within a grid placed in an attic. There are tubes and bulbs all around and two bells on the sides: one indicates the active pay lines, the other the multiplier applied at the time of the Spin.

Slot features

The game grid has 3 reels and 3 rows with 5 active pay lines that become 27 during the bonus round.

The minimum bet is €0.10 variable up to a maximum of €50. You can choose to set the automatic mode, with a minimum of 10 spins up to 1,000 or infinite, in which case simply click the same button again to stop them. If you wish, there are several threshold limits beyond which the automatic spins will stop.

The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.8%.

Symbols and features

The symbols are almost all traditional ones from classic slots. We find cherries, plums, oranges, lemons, watermelons, bells, and double 7s, plus a cylinder-shaped headdress.

To understand their value, just enter the pay table. As mentioned at the beginning, you play with 5 active lines in regular play. The clover is the Wild symbol. It only lands on the middle reel and, as its name suggests, completes winning combinations. But it also has another function, namely to give 1 to 6 free spins. When the bonus game starts, the pay lines increase to 27 and a progressive multiplier of 2x to 7x is assigned to each Respin. Extra pay lines and multiplier are shown in the bells next to the reels.

In addition to this function, there is also the Gamble one, which gives us the opportunity to increase the last win or lose the entire sum. Here's how the risk function works: after a winning combination, two symbols will appear below the grid, the dollar sign to collect the winnings, and the playing card to risk it. If we choose the second option, 5 playing cards, one at the top and four at the bottom, will appear. The dealer will turn over his card and we will have to choose one of the four hoping that it is higher than the first. 

Experience the thrill of Mechanical Clover and try your luck today!

Below is a review for the slot game "Mechanical Clover".

Gameplay Features
Game Design

Slot Features

The game grid has 3 reels and 3 rows with 5 active paylines, which increase to 27 during the bonus round.

The minimum bet is €0.10 and can be increased up to a maximum of €50. You can choose the autoplay mode, from as little as 10 spins up to 1,000 or infinite, and simply click the same button again to stop. There are also several threshold limits that, once reached, will stop the automatic spins.

The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.8%.

Symbols and Functions

The symbols are almost all traditional ones seen in classic slots, such as cherries, plums, oranges, lemons, watermelons, bells, and double 7s, plus a cylinder-shaped hat.

To understand their value, simply refer to the paytable. As mentioned earlier, the game is played with 5 active lines in regular play. The four-leaf clover is the Wild symbol, landing only on the middle reel and completing winning combinations. It also has another function, which is to award between 1 and 6 free spins. During the bonus round, paylines increase to 27, and a progressive multiplier from x2 to x7 is also assigned to each Respin. Additional paylines and multipliers are shown in the bells next to the reels.

In addition to these features, there's also a Gamble function, which allows you to increase the last win or lose the entire amount. Here’s how it works: after a winning combination, two symbols will appear under the grid: a dollar symbol to collect the win and a card symbol to risk it. If you choose the latter, you'll see five playing cards: one on top and four below. The banker will reveal their card, and you'll have to choose one of the four hoping it's higher than theirs.

Overall, Mechanical Clover is an exquisitely designed slot that offers an enjoyable gaming experience, with plenty of features to keep things interesting for experienced gamblers.

Review: Mechanical Clover

Fruits are possibly the most iconic element of the world of slots, dating back to the times of old-fashioned bar machines. This is why all providers, big or small, have tackled this theme at some point, often creating truly spectacular slots.

BGaming's take on this theme is quite impressive: combining historical elements with the steampunk genre seems like a brilliant move.

For those who don't know, steampunk refers to a literary movement that sets its stories in the Victorian era, when technological progress relied solely on steam and increasingly precise gears capable of moving anything.

The graphics fully reflect this movement: the fruits seem to be made of metallic material yet still maintain their bright colors, and they move within a grid set in an attic. Surrounding them are pipes and bulbs, with two bells on the sides: one indicates the active paylines, while the other shows the multiplier applied at the moment of the spin.

Slot Features

The game grid has 3 reels and 3 rows with 5 active paylines, which increase to 27 during the bonus round.

The minimum bet is €0.10 and can be increased up to a maximum of €50. You can choose the autoplay mode, from as little as 10 spins up to 1,000 or infinite, and simply click the same button again to stop. There are also several threshold limits that, once reached, will stop the automatic spins.

The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.8%.

The four-leaf clover is the Wild symbol, landing only on the middle reel and completing winning combinations. It also has another function, which is to award between 1 and 6 free spins. During the bonus round, paylines increase to 27, and a progressive multiplier from x2 to x7 is also assigned to each Respin. Additional paylines and multipliers are shown in the bells next to the reels.

In addition to these features, there's also a Gamble function, which allows you to increase the last win or lose the entire amount. Here’s how it works: after a winning combination, two symbols will appear under the grid: a dollar symbol to collect the win and a card symbol to risk it. If you choose the latter, you'll see five playing cards: one on top and four below. The banker will reveal their card, and you'll have to choose one of the four hoping it's higher than theirs.

Overall, Mechanical Clover is an exquisitely designed slot that offers an enjoyable gaming experience, with plenty of features to keep things interesting for experienced gamblers.

Gameplay Features

Mechanical Clover is a 3x3 online slot game with 5 active paylines that increase to 27 in the bonus round. Game Design

Surrounding them are pipes and bulbs, with two bells on the sides: one indicates the active paylines, while the other shows the multiplier applied at the moment of the spin.

Paylines and Betting Range

There is also a Gamble function that allows players to increase the last win or lose the entire amount. The Gamble function presents players with five playing cards, one on top and four below. The banker will reveal their card, and the player must choose one of the four hoping it's higher.

Return to Player (RTP)

Mechanical Clover has a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 96.8%, which is a decent payout percentage for online slot games. This means that, on average, for every €100 played, the game will pay out €96.80 in winnings.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Mechanical Clover".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Mechanical Clover

Fruits are possibly the most iconic element of the world of slots, dating back to the times of old-fashioned bar machines. This is why all providers, big or small, have tackled this theme at some point, often creating truly spectacular slots.

BGaming's take on this theme is quite impressive: combining historical elements with the steampunk genre seems like a brilliant move.

For those who don't know, steampunk refers to a literary movement that sets its stories in the Victorian era, when technological progress relied solely on steam and increasingly precise gears capable of moving anything.

The graphics fully reflect this movement: the fruits seem to be made of metallic material yet still maintain their bright colors, and they move within a grid set in an attic. Surrounding them are pipes and bulbs, with two bells on the sides: one indicates the active paylines, while the other shows the multiplier applied at the moment of the spin.

Slot Features

The game grid has 3 reels and 3 rows with 5 active paylines, which increase to 27 during the bonus round.

The minimum bet is €0.10 and can be increased up to a maximum of €50. You can choose the autoplay mode, from as little as 10 spins up to 1,000 or infinite, and simply click the same button again to stop. There are also several threshold limits that, once reached, will stop the automatic spins.

The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.8%.

Symbols and Functions

The symbols are almost all traditional ones seen in classic slots, such as cherries, plums, oranges, lemons, watermelons, bells, and double 7s, plus a cylinder-shaped hat.

To understand their value, simply refer to the paytable. As mentioned earlier, the game is played with 5 active lines in regular play. The four-leaf clover is the Wild symbol, landing only on the middle reel and completing winning combinations. It also has another function, which is to award between 1 and 6 free spins. During the bonus round, paylines increase to 27, and a progressive multiplier from x2 to x7 is also assigned to each Respin. Additional paylines and multipliers are shown in the bells next to the reels.

In addition to these features, there's also a Gamble function, which allows you to increase the last win or lose the entire amount. Here’s how it works: after a winning combination, two symbols will appear under the grid: a dollar symbol to collect the win and a card symbol to risk it. If you choose the latter, you'll see five playing cards: one on top and four below. The banker will reveal their card, and you'll have to choose one of the four hoping it's higher than theirs.

Overall, Mechanical Clover is an exquisitely designed slot that offers an enjoyable gaming experience, with plenty of features to keep things interesting for experienced gamblers.
